content: S-B (T) HF Screwdriver bit Professional-performance screwdriver bit with torsion zone and holding function for better sticking in soft joint applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Bits and sockets- ### FEATURES:Features Elastic torsion zone in the bit shank cushions higher loads – the bit twists slightly under impact for greater durability and extended service life Extra-high-strength steel reduces the risk of premature bit breakage Holding function for better screw head grip, precision-machined to help reduce stripping and wobbling No time wasted looking for dropped screws Applications ¼ hexagon connection end for use with all common bit holders (DIN ISO 1173-D 6.3) Recommended for use with cordless universal drivers in soft-joint applications, e.g. in wood or drywall board For driving screws in a variety of materials ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: 1/4 in Hex shank Technical Data | Connection end | 1/4 in Hex shank ### ITEMS- 2039138 - Driver bit S-B TX25 25/1 T-HF (10) - Package Size 10 pc - 2039143 - Driver bit S-B TX25 50/2 T-HF (5) - Package Size 5 pc
tag_description: Professional-performance screwdriver bit with torsion zone and holding function for better sticking in soft joint applications
